title: The Long Arm of the Gur
tags: the long arm of the gur
content:
hoes, grey-pink and pulpy.He would never forget it. Heavy Crossbow 18m Two-Handed 8.1 380

The Long Arm of the Gur

1d10 +2 Piercing

Revenant Scourge: When used against undead creatures this weapon has +1d4 bonus to Attack and Damage rolls.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

When the boy was seven, he was frightened badly by a vampire spawn during a public burning. Seized by the flames, the creature didn't shrivel up. It swelled and burst like a squeezed leech.
